body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Caroline Sherrill. Father of Mary Sherrill, Benjamin Sherrill, Samuel Sherrill, Emeline Sherrill. Merchant in Jefferson County in 1860. Owner of M.W. Sherrill & Co. in 1863.
